Package fr.iutvalence.info.but.s2_01.mcq.storage.core

Interface Storage

All Known Implementing Classes:
FileSystemStorage
public interface Storage
Storage service interface (load/save questionnaires/submissions).

    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • loadQuestionnaires

      Map<QuestionnaireId,Questionnaire> loadQuestionnaires() throws StorageAccessException
      Loads questionnaires.
      Returns:
      loaded questionnaires.
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if storage access fails during loading.

    • saveQuestionnaires

      int saveQuestionnaires(Collection<Questionnaire> questionnaires) throws StorageAccessException
      Saves questionnaires.
      Parameters:
      questionnaires - questionnaires to save.
      Returns:
      saved questionnaires count (duplicates are not saved).
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if storage access fails during saving.

    • saveQuestionnaire

      boolean saveQuestionnaire(Questionnaire questionnaire) throws StorageAccessException
      Saves a single questionnaire.
      Parameters:
      questionnaire - questionnaire to save.
      Returns:
      true if questionnaire has been saved, false if a questionnaire with the same questionnaire id already exists.
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if storage access fails during saving.

    • loadSubmissions

      Map<SubmissionId,Submission> loadSubmissions() throws StorageAccessException
      Loads submissions.
      Returns:
      loaded submissions.
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if storage access fails during loading.

    • saveSubmissions

      int saveSubmissions(Collection<Submission> submissions) throws StorageAccessException
      Saves submissions.
      Parameters:
      submissions - submissions to save.
      Returns:
      saved submissions count (duplicates are not saved).
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if storage access fails during saving.

    • saveSubmission

      boolean saveSubmission(Submission submission) throws StorageAccessException
      Saves a single submission.
      Parameters:
      submission - submission to save.
      Returns:
      true if submission has been saved, false if a submission with the same submission id already exists.
      Throws:
      StorageAccessException - if storage access fails during saving.
